TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {103611=Copyright © 2012 KBOO Community Radio | Copyright Policy | Community Guidelines | Website Illustration & Design by: KMF ILLUSTRATION, 95199=Latest newsletter: May 2015, 51578=So sorry to report that there is no Folk Espresso this morning....mainly because there appears to be no electricity at the station.  I showed up at 5:15 with a sackful of great music, but alas, the place was a ghost-town.  The night's wind and rain must've done quite a number on some electrical box somewhere!  Well, be sure to tune in tomorrow morning for Early Morning Gumbo with Diane Karl--she always does a terrific show.  And I'll be back next Monday..., 88300=So, Mr. Randy, you liked my quirky music? Hope you heard my show yesterday morning (October 27). It, too, was filled with a wide variety of, uh, good stuff. I'm on again on Monday, November 24th. I do hope you'll tune in. I'll play a randy tune, just for you., 39641=Annual Gales of November Show: Songs about shipwrecks, lighthouses, mermaids, and general nautical mayhem- inspired by Gordon Lightfoots' classic "Wreck of the Edmund Fitgerald", 23082=I'm back on Monday, December 20, and man-oh-man what a show I have planned for that morning!  You'll be smilin' ear-to-ear during that magnificently upbeat and cheery hour-and-a-half.  Put it on your calendar!, 59549=It's a thrill this morning to be joined in the studio by John Standefer, the 2002 National Fingerstyle Guitar Champion.  He's helping out this morning with the Fall Membership Drive.  Can we count on you to chip in?  Please support this great music and this very worthy radio station!, 87710=Yikes! Only today did I see your kind email from September 22 that you left on the KBOO website. I wasn't expecting any "fan mail" here at kboo.fm so I didn't thing to check...until a friend told me about the hundreds, nay, thousands of emails piling up at this website all about my show. Oddly enough, only one (yours) was positive. All the others said something to the effect of "what the *&^!%&# is SHE doing on this venerable radio station!"}
textBeforeTable: 12/27/2010 Air date:  Folk Espresso Program name:  Folk Categories: Folk Espresso playlist for 12/27/2010 Playlists last » next › … 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 Early morning folk music to get your week started. A different host each week. Short Description:
textAfterTable: The Kossoy Sisters Willie Moore Bowling Green Dear Listeners, OK, so I had to put a whole block of food-related music in.  Ah yes, food-glorious-food!  I guess that's just where the brain is around this time of year.  Heck, that's where the brain is 365 days a year...  Hope you enjoyed those tunes...and the rest of the show too! Join me next Monday for some more good stuff....and tune in tomorrow for Early Morning Gumbo.  Wow, there's that food theme again... Warmly, Diane Login or register to post comments Folk Espresso playlist for 12/20/2010 Categories: Folk Program name:  Folk Espresso Air date:  12/20/2010 Artist Title Album Kirkmount Wexford Carol / Il est ne le divin enfant Mittens for Christmas John Prine Christmas in Prison Sweet Revenge Joni Harms The Gift Christmas in the Country Loudon
